data.persona: I grow a beard and shave it off.  I pee standing up.  I hunt and gather for my village.  I made my own crossbow.
data.description:
You are in the The bar.
The bar is made of oak wood. It is finely varnished, though dulled over time and covered with wet drinks.
There's a bar here.
The governor is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I create a diversion to create chaos so I can get the bar.
data.mid_motivation: I remove all the fasteners from the bar in order to make it retrievable.
data.long_motivation: I sneak into the building at night in order to get the bar.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: put chisel and hammer on bag

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: steal the bar from the bartender
